br.fml.eti.machinegun.util
Class GenericCapsuleForLazyPeople<T extends java.io.Serializable>

java.lang.Object
  br.fml.eti.machinegun.util.GenericCapsuleForLazyPeople<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capsule<T>
public class GenericCapsuleForLazyPeople<T extends java.io.Serializable>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Capsule<T>

A fast-food Capsule implementation using the Java serialization. But come on! Do not use this, you can do better! Use it only if you are really lazy and performance is not your forte. We really recommend you to use the Google Protocol Buffers, it is pretty cool and really efficient.

It works only if your data type implements Serializable.

Author:
Felipe Micaroni Lalli (micaroni@gmail.com) Nov 20, 2010 4:54:03 PM
